img.alt: The front of the high school building

div.p: Reed and Roarke Brock enjoying PE outside. They helped plant trees and did a FANTASTIC job. Keep up the GREAT work!
Vikings are you still reading? Colt and Mrs. Smith reading together during a google meet! Great job Colt!
Noah wanted to Read with Mrs. Desormeaux, so she did a video chat with him! Great job reading Noah!
This weeks library assignment was a success! The kids were to pick out a recipe and READ the recipe and then make something yummy! Great job Kaylor, Kinzie, Colt, Abby, ...
